select * from maoding_im_group where 1=1
and (orgId=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or groupId=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (orgId=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or groupId=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select from maoding_im_group a where 1=1
and id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (org_id=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or group_no=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (org_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or group_no=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and org_id IN (SELECT cu.company_id FROM maoding_web_company_user cu WHERE cu.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cu.audit_status='1')
order by root_org_id,create_date

select DISTINCT from maoding_im_group a
LEFT JOIN maoding_im_group_member b on a.id = b.group_id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project c on a.org_id =c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task d on c.id = d.project_id and d.task_status='0'
where 1=1 and a.group_type = 3
and b.account_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.org_id =#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and( c.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.company_bid = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or d.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
order by a.create_date
select ,#{url} as url from maoding_im_group a LEFT JOIN maoding_im_group_member b on a.id = b.group_id where 1=1 and b.account_id = #{userId}

select from maoding_im_group a LEFT JOIN maoding_im_group_member b on a.id = b.group_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart c on a.org_id = c.id where 1=1 and b.account_id = #{userId} and ((a.org_id = #{companyId} and a.group_type = 0) or (c.company_id = #{companyId} and a.group_type = 1) or (a.root_org_id =#{companyId} and a.group_type = 2 ))
